get.description: Returns static information about the system.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Device status values which will be included in results.

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Device status values which will be exluded from results.

ram_buffered.description: Amount of buffered system memory in MB.

ram_total.description: Total amount of system memory in MB.

ram_used.description: Amount of used system memory in MB.

flash_total.description: Total amount of flash memory in MB.

ram_free.description: Amount of free system memory in MB.

flash_free.description: Amount of free flash memory in MB.

flash_used.description: Amount of used flash memory in MB.

ram_shared.description: Amount of shared system memory in MB.

loadavg.description: CPU load average over the last minute.

localtime.description: Local time timestamp of the system.

load.description: CPU load average (in %) over the last minute, 5 minutes and 15 minutes.

min5.description: CPU load average over the last 5 minutes.

min15.description: CPU load average over the last 15 minutes.

min1.description: CPU load average over the last minute.

uptime_seconds.description: Uptime of the system in seconds.

get.description: Returns system status (dynamic information such as memory usage, uptime...)

get.summary: Returns all possible packages on device

data.description:
Array of recorded CPU loads. Array format:
a[0] = Timestamp.
a[1] = 1 minute load.
a[2] = 5 minute load.
a[3] = 15 minute load.

id.description: Parameter ID, used to when expanding the parameter (e.g. "%er")

200PackagesPaths.description: Returns data about available packages paths
